name: Soul Chomper
description:
Soul Chomper

_________________________________________________

Description

In this small action roguelike you play as a little ghost, fighting your way through hordes of enemies to conquer their world. You have a big arsenal of different weapons at your disposal to achieve your goal, if you can find them. At the end you'll face one of two mini bosses before entering another world to be conquered.

Good luck!

Note: Linux and Mac versions are not tested

_________________________________________________

Controls

Use WASD to move, aim with MOUSE and MOUSE BUTTONS to attack. With SPACE you can blink or dash (depending on your character). With E you interact with the world. Press Q to switch between two weapon sets. When having one handed weapons you can swap them between hands with TAB. Press ESC to pause the game and/or view your achievements.

_________________________________________________

Tips

  • Some weapons can be charged when holding the mouse button
  • Two handed weapons have two different attacks (left / right mouse)
  • You have two weapon sets that you can change at anytime with Q.
  • Switch weapons between left and right hand with TAB (one handed weapons only).
  • You can equip two one handed weapons at once, each with its own attack
  • Keep an eye on your stamina (green bar), if it gets depleted you are slowed and stamina regeneration is stopped for a short period of time.
  • Press ESC to see your achievements.
  • Small details in the game might hint on something.

_________________________________________________

Features

  • 17 weapons
  • 7 enemies
  • 2 minibosses
  • 4 playable characters
  • 4 modifier
  • 13 achievements
  • 2 difficulty settings
  • ... and lots of small secrets to discover
